title: A problem with an ezreal
body: so today i played adc ezreal and got 12/3/6 and i did 22664 damage (the best damage) to champions and had 147 cs and also i got an A- but sona gets a s- also if I had an s i could've gotten level 6 ezreal... to be honest look at the game i did good... and i'm pretty sure it was an s but wow i get an a- please tell me what do need more kills? assists? lesser death?? what is it. I'm really question who made a decision but i'm pretty sure he made a miss take.. If u guys think this is an stupid decision please give me an level 6 ezreal skin token because if not I'm going to be tilted for the next century... Please look at the game and tell me if i did good or bad... How much do I need to do to get an s? I'm questioned... seriously Riot this is not right... And Also can you guys tell me how to reroll? Also please read this....

replies.body: It sounds like you really did a good job, that's worth celebrating!  I know it's not the score that you want, but a lot of Ezreal in that role are performing really well right now too.  Just keep at it, and you'll get it!
You're being compared to people who played the same champion as you. Not other champions. Ezreal is in no way, shape or form being compared to Sona.
